description: Works to trees in Southgate Green Conservation area; Common Hawthorn (T3), Common Hornbeam (T5), Wild Cherry (T6), 3x Common Yew (T7, T8, T17), 6x Cherry Laurel (T9, T10, T34, G1, G2, G3), 2x Lawson Cypress (T11, T12)- remove as described on "Reason for works".
